Messier Survey, LLC

Land Surveyors

Professional Services

Messier Survey, LLC (succesor to Messier & Associates, Inc.), with its experienced staff of land surveyors and support personnel, provides our clients with such specific personalized services as the following:

Land Surveying and Planning Services

  • Boundary surveys
  • Topographic surveys
  • ALTA Surveys
  • Property line determinations
  • Mortgage surveys
  • Horizontal and vertical control surveys for aerial photogrammetry
  • Residential, commercial and industrial subdivision planning and design
  • Lot pinning
  • Construction stakeout of buildings, roads, parking lots, storm drains, utilities and septic systems
  • As-built surveys
  • Land use planning consultation and project feasibility analysis
  • Preparation of applications and supporting data for local, regional, State, and Federal Applications and Permits

To best provide the most effective and accurate execution of the work for its clients, Messier Survey, LLC is equipped with contemporary industry standard electronic and computer hardware & software for surveying, drafting and office activities, including electronic total stations, data collectors and laptop computers for field surveying activities, and Autodesk AutoCADÂ® and Land Desktop Development Civil/Survey application software programs for survey computations and plan generation. All original plans prepared by Messier Survey, LLC are produced with our in-house computer system and plotters. Reports, specifications and other written materials are produced using computer desktop publishing and printing.

For your total land use and development project needs, Messier Survey, LLC works directly in concert with other third-party consulting design professionals, including civil engineers, traffic engineers, certified soil/wetland scientists, mechanical/plumbing/electrical engineers, landscape architects, and others as may be necessary to provide full, personalized design service capabilities for your particular project.

To discuss how Messier Survey, LLC may meet your particular land surveying and land use and development needs and how we may assist you in bringing your project to reality, please contact David Simler, Director of Surveying Services, at (860) 646-6013 or by email at dave@messiersurvey.com.
